subject: Baseball
Sports Injuries
lead_paragraph: In the Mets’ victory over the Pirates, Jenrry Mejia, a rookie right-hander, left the game with an acute strain of a muscle in the back of his right shoulder.
snippet: In the Mets’ victory over the Pirates, Jenrry Mejia, a rookie right-hander, left the game with an acute strain of a muscle in the back of his right shoulder.
